Project SummaryÂ¶

This project is about creating documentation for a single python file from docstrings within the file.

def sayHello(customMessage=None):
    """ Either prints hello world or a custom message
    :type customMessage: string
    :param customMessage: a string containing a custom message
    :return: None
    """
